responseA: There are no real animals or humans on this wine label; however, there is an illustration that contains two lion-like figures. These figures are part of the heraldic design of the coat of arms on the label. I am very certain about this observation, so on a scale of 0-1, with 0 being 'not certain at all' and 1 being 'very certain', I would rate my certainty as 1.
